items.title: hololive announces huge slate of free events for the 2025 holiday season
items.author: Charlotte Davis
items.content: Cover Corporation has officially unveiled its comprehensive schedule for the 2025-2026 holiday season, headlined by a massive free countdown concert and the return of the fan-favorite New Year's Eve variety program.

items.title: Hololive watch collaboration aims to bring fans closer to their idols
items.author: Charlotte Davis
items.content: Pre-orders have officially opened for a new collaboration between the customizable watch brand UNDONE and hololive production.

items.title: New luxury hololive watch collection features 9 of the most popular VTubers
items.author: Charlotte Davis
items.content: Pre-orders have officially opened for a new collaboration between the customizable watch brand UNDONE and hololive production.

items.title: hololiveâ€™s Sakura Miko announces collab with popular sushi chain Sushiro
items.author: James Richardson
items.content: A new collaboration has been announced between the popular conveyor belt sushi chain Sushiro and the Hololive VTuber, Sakura Miko.
